contacts.name: Master Sergeant Kane
contacts.description: Retired special forces operator who trained the warrior

contacts.name: Elena Brightblade
contacts.description: Keeper of the temple dedicated to warrior spirits

contacts.name: Marcus "Reaper" Stone
contacts.description: Former competitor who now supplies weapons and intel

contacts.name: The Phantom Knight
contacts.relationship: Ancestral spirit that guides in battle
contacts.description: Spectral warrior from ages past, appears in times of need

concept.name: Oracle of the Veil
concept.concept: Touched by otherworldly forces that grant visions and power
concept.tenet: What truth lies beyond the veil of reality?

concept.name: Scholar of the Arcane
concept.concept: Years of study in forbidden libraries and ancient texts

anchorMove.name: Channel the Unknown
anchorMove.description: Tap into mysterious forces beyond mortal understanding

outcomes.13+: The forces obey your will completely
outcomes.7-9: You channel the power, but at a cost

flaw.name: Otherworldly Connection
flaw.description: The forces you channel leave their mark on you, making it hard to relate to normal people

flaw.name: Too Much Truth
flaw.description: Sometimes seeing through all deceptions reveals truths you wish you didn't know

anchorMove.name: Rational Mind
anchorMove.description: Use logic and reason to solve problems

flaw.name: Overthinking
flaw.description: Your logical mind sometimes paralyzes you with too many possibilities

flaw.name: Pattern Obsession
flaw.description: You sometimes see patterns where none exist, leading you astray

contacts.name: Professor Aldrich Webb
contacts.description: Elderly professor who provides access to rare manuscripts

contacts.name: Cassandra Nightveil
contacts.description: Another oracle touched by otherworldly forces

contacts.name: Lord Ashford Gray
contacts.description: Wealthy collector obsessed with artifacts and forbidden knowledge

contacts.name: Ezra the Wanderer
contacts.relationship: Mysterious mentor from the other side
contacts.description: Enigmatic guide who appears in dreams and visions
